text: I am readyOver the past few months I had renewed my hope and even prayed for answers  but today I have found that those positive thoughts have disappeared   Since   not much has gone my way and many told me to return to school and get a master s degree to forward my career  so I did  I finished in the top   of the class and it is the only time in the past five years when I felt like I was on the right track  However  a year after I walked off of that stage it is clear that all that lay ahead was failure  After applying for hundreds of jobs  interviewing for jobs  hiring recruiters  and career coaches I find myself broke and on the brink of homelessness  I have even tried to get work in places like the oil fields  overnight FedEx facilities and restaurants to no avail  I am broken and at a loss for plausible solutions  Perhaps life is just not for us all I am thinking of putting on my best suit and hopping on a plane to see my grandmother  She passed away years ago  but sitting next to her gravestone to remember the good times while I drink and add in some poisonous additives along with some sleeping pills so I can enter the long goodnight is what keeps entering my mind today   I am ready for it  Those that say that people who kill themselves don t want to stop living  but rather  they want to stop the pain are absolutely correct  My life is the issue and if I had one wish I would walk into a Children s Hospital and give the life that I have left to someone who could make better use of it Thanks for reading  I just felt like I had to get that off of my chest
summary: A year after finishing a master's degree, she is broke and on the brink of homelessness. She wants to kill herself to end the pain. If she could, she would walk into a Children's Hospital and give her life to someone who could use it better.
cleaned: year finish masters degree broke brink homelessness want kill end pain walk child hospital life use well

text: Tired of always being alone As the title says the loneliness of my life has been causing me some pretty dark thoughts lately   I want to change things but I don t even really know how at this point  I m   and I have never even been in love or got to feel someone in truly in love with me  I have dated a few girls in my life  some for even moderate lengths of time  But those that seemed really into me I just didn t feel the same for and those that I really started to feel something for never felt it for me   I have gone through depression pretty much my whole life  But it normally is much more in the background than it is right now  It constantly causes me to doubt myself and my value but I do manage to live a fairly normal life  I don t connect well to many people at the best of times and when things get darker for me I tend to push those I have formed a bond with away   And with this pandemic what few social interactions and safety net I did have in my life feel like they have been stripped away   Now I sit here starting another weekend and again no one calls or messages me  I feel completely alone  I know I m responsible for how my life ended up and I do want it to change but I just don t know how or where to start   I don t want to end up hurting myself but I have thought about doing it constantly for weeks now
summary: Loneliness has been making him depressed lately. He's never been in love and he's never felt truly in love. He doesn't connect well with people and when things get dark for him, he pushes those he's close to away.
cleaned: loneliness make depressed lately love feel truly love not connect people thing dark push close away
